intro: Borreria kleinii, commonly known as the Cape rose or yellow star, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family and is characterized by its clusters of small, yellow, star-shaped flowers. The plant has narrow, linear leaves and is often found in rocky or sandy soils. It is drought-tolerant and thrives in full sun, making it a popular choice for xeriscaping. Borreria kleinii is also valued for its ornamental appeal and ability to attract pollinators.
